notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the linux-firmware SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8. It addresses 8 CVEs: CVE-2022-27635, CVE-2022-40964, CVE-2022-46329, CVE-2023-20569, CVE-2023-20584, and 3 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: linux-firmware security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8
